name: Party Tap Tempo Demo
description:
How to Play Party Tap

***WARNING!!! If you have history of epilepsy, this game probably isn't for you!! ***

You are to show off at what you can and how hard you can party.

---- CONTROLS ------

With the newest patch to the game, you can play with 2 different layouts. One of the layouts is the default one, and it is far easier than the second layout

**** Left Side 1st Layout ****
S - Tap
A - Left
W - Up
D - Right
X - Down

**** Left Side 2nd Layout ****

A - Left
W - Up
D - Right
S - Down

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**** Right Side 1st Layout ****
Semicolon - Tap
L - Left
P - Right
Single Quote - Up
Question Mark- Downs

**** Right Side 2nd Layout ****

Semicolon - Tap

Single Quote - Tap

*** 1st Layout Scheme On Keyboard ***

             W                                                                P

A          S            D                                    L            ;             '

             X                                                                  /

**Center keys are for tapping, while surrounding keys are directional keys

**** 2nd Layout Scheme On Keyboard ***

             W

A           S            D                                         ;              '

**Left Side are directional key only, while Right Side is tapping keys only.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is the only difficulty in here.

The music that you hear from this game belongs to its rightful owner. Be sure that you support them full-heartedly. This game is not made for profit, but to show my gratitude and my appreciation. This is also to demostrate how intense this game can get when it comes to it's initial and official release.

Though this version of the game will not be up for too long, but I am planning to reupload this in the near future, and possibly make this into a mobile game.

*** AGAIN, If you have history of epilepsy, DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME!!!! ***
